name: Crey sim!! 2D
description:
This is like a arcade game of sorts were you go around and collect keys! These keys give you points, you can also get coins witch give you more time to collect keys. There will be a cop car that chases you so be careful!

P.s I made the sounds and the textures, but not the key the grass and the song!

P.P.s go to http://jnoodle.com/freemusic/index.html to get AWESOME! music!
